headline: PG&E Corporation (PCG) Calls Innovators to Help Solve California’s Energy Challenge
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the Best 52-Week Low Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On July 7, PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) announced that it is calling for innovators to help solve California’s toughest energy challenges. The company has up to $25 million to fund new projects. They want entrepreneurs, inventors, and tech experts to […]
